fabrics.name: Super 100s Merino Wool
fabrics.description: Fine merino wool with Super 100s thread count, offering exceptional softness and year-round comfort
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean recommended. Can be hand washed in cool water with wool-specific detergent. Lay flat to dry. Steam press on wool setting.
fabrics.common_uses: Year-round suits, dress trousers, lightweight blazers, travel suits

fabrics.name: Worsted Wool
fabrics.description: Tightly spun wool with smooth finish, the standard for professional business wear
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean only for structured garments. Steam between wears. Brush regularly to maintain appearance. Store on shaped hangers.
fabrics.common_uses: Business suits, formal trousers, blazers, professional attire

fabrics.name: Harris Tweed
fabrics.description: Hand-woven Scottish tweed with distinctive texture and exceptional durability, protected by trademark
fabrics.texture: Rough, textured, nubby surface with flecks
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean preferred. Air out regularly. Brush with stiff brush to remove dirt. Store with moth protection. Can spot clean with damp cloth.
fabrics.common_uses: Country jackets, blazers, caps, vests, outerwear, bags

fabrics.name: Flannel Wool
fabrics.description: Soft, napped wool fabric with fuzzy surface, offering warmth without excessive weight
fabrics.texture: Napped surface, soft hand, slightly fuzzy
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean recommended. Brush lightly to maintain nap. Steam to refresh. Avoid over-pressing which can flatten texture.
fabrics.common_uses: Fall/winter suits, trousers, sport coats, smart casual blazers

fabrics.name: Tropical Wool
fabrics.description: Lightweight, open-weave wool designed for hot climates while maintaining professional appearance
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean. Very breathable structure means it resists wrinkles well. Steam to refresh. Allow to air between wears.
fabrics.common_uses: Summer suits, warm climate business wear, tropical formal attire

fabrics.name: Cashmere
fabrics.description: Luxuriously soft fiber from Kashmir goat undercoat, premium and expensive
fabrics.care_instructions: Hand wash in cool water with cashmere shampoo or dry clean. Never wring. Dry flat. Store folded, never hang. Use breathable storage bags.
fabrics.common_uses: Luxury coats, sweaters, scarves, high-end tailoring

fabrics.name: Egyptian Cotton Poplin
fabrics.description: Premium long-staple cotton with tight plain weave and subtle rib, the gold standard for dress shirts
fabrics.care_instructions: Machine wash warm. Iron while slightly damp for best results. Can be starched for extra crispness. High thread count means very durable.
fabrics.common_uses: Dress shirts, formal shirts, summer trousers, light dresses

fabrics.name: Sea Island Cotton
fabrics.description: Rarest and finest cotton in the world, grown only in West Indies, incredibly soft and strong
fabrics.care_instructions: Machine wash on delicate. Iron on high heat. Extra-long staple means exceptional durability despite fine hand. Improves with washing.
fabrics.common_uses: Luxury dress shirts, high-end underwear, premium bedding

fabrics.name: Irish Linen
fabrics.description: Premium linen from flax grown in Ireland and Belgium, valued for cool comfort and natural texture
fabrics.care_instructions: Machine wash cool. Line dry or tumble low. Iron while damp for crisp finish. Embrace natural wrinkles for casual look. Gets softer with each wash.
fabrics.common_uses: Summer suits, casual shirts, trousers, dresses, home textiles

fabrics.name: Silk Charmeuse
fabrics.description: Luxurious silk with satin weave, glossy face and matte back, ultimate drape
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean recommended. Can hand wash cool with silk detergent. Never wring. Roll in towel to remove water, then lay flat. Iron on silk setting while slightly damp.
fabrics.common_uses: Evening wear, blouses, linings, lingerie, luxury garments

fabrics.name: Raw Silk (Silk Noil)
fabrics.description: Textured silk with matte finish, made from short silk fibers, more casual than charmeuse
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean or careful hand wash. May shrink. Iron on medium heat. Less delicate than smooth silks. Slight natural irregularity is characteristic.
fabrics.common_uses: Casual shirts, summer jackets, dresses, informal tailoring

fabrics.name: Selvedge Denim
fabrics.description: Premium denim woven on vintage shuttle looms with self-finished edges, prized by enthusiasts
fabrics.care_instructions: Wash rarely to preserve color and develop fades. Turn inside out, cold wash. Line dry or low tumble. Raw denim may bleed initially. No ironing needed.
fabrics.common_uses: Premium jeans, jackets, workwear, casual garments

fabrics.name: Stretch Wool Blend
fabrics.description: Modern suiting fabric combining wool with elastane for comfort and movement
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean recommended. More wrinkle resistant than pure wool. Avoid excessive heat when pressing. Returns to shape well.
fabrics.common_uses: Travel suits, performance suiting, modern business wear, trousers

fabrics.name: Mohair Blend
fabrics.description: Wool blended with mohair (goat hair) for exceptional luster and cool comfort
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean only. Very resilient and wrinkle-resistant. Brush to maintain luster. Steam gently. Mohair adds sheen and springiness.
fabrics.common_uses: Summer suits, tuxedos, formal wear, lightweight tailoring

fabrics.name: Corduroy
fabrics.description: Cotton fabric with distinctive vertical ribs or 'wales', ranges from fine to wide cord
fabrics.care_instructions: Machine wash inside out. Shake out and hang to dry to preserve pile. Iron on reverse with steam. Brush pile if flattened.
fabrics.common_uses: Casual trousers, sport coats, shirts, jackets, vintage-style garments

fabrics.name: Moleskin
fabrics.description: Dense cotton fabric with soft suede-like surface, originally workwear, now fashionable casual wear
fabrics.care_instructions: Machine wash cool. Tumble dry low or hang. Brush surface gently if needed. Very durable. Softens with wear.
fabrics.common_uses: Casual trousers, work jackets, shirts, rugged casual wear
